import React,{Fragment} from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../../../layout/breadcrumb' import {Container,Row,Col,Card,CardHeader,CardBody,CardFooter,Button,Form,FormGroup,Label,Input,InputGroup,InputGroupAddon ,InputGroupText} from 'reactstrap' import {BasicInputGroups,LeftAddon,RightAddon,JointAddon,LeftRightAddon,SolidStyle,SquareStyle,FlatStyle,RaiseStyle,Submit,Cancel} from "../../../constant"; const InputGroups = (props) => { return (
{BasicInputGroups}
{"@"} {"@example.com"} {"$"}{"0.00"} {"$"} {".00"} {"@"} {"+"} {"#"} {"$"} {".00"}

); } export default InputGroups;
